job description:
Lead Data Scientist Compensation: $180k

A leader in location technology and intelligence is seeking an experienced data scientist to lead the mission of how to understand and leverage a massive and growing set of diverse location information to solve global challenges.

YOUR CAREER GOALS:

Contribute to the mission of maximizing your share of wallet with location-based technology, services and data insights that power us to make educated data-driven business decisions. Building on your experience, you will help define the Machine Learning roadmap and then be the owner of modeling and delivery of all machine learning technology to support appropriate products and capabilities. This includes a diverse range of needs involving billions of daily global observations of both network infrastructure as well as mobile device movement to improve accuracy and ability to position devices as well as the ability to apply context and understanding to the mobile device movements.

YOUR AMAZING QUALITIES:

You are passionate about continuous innovation and selling technology that drastically improves user insights and experiences. You have a Master's Degree or PhD degree in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning or a related technical field and:
  • 5+ years' experience using Python. R, Scala or Java (Python preferred)
  • 5+ years' experience consuming and deploying data via APIs
  • 5+ years' experience in Model Selection and Sampling
  • 5+ years' experience in Business and Leadership
  • 4+ years' experience in applying different learning techniques (supervised, unsupervised, semi-supervised)
  • 4+ years' experience in the Machine Learning pipeline - (data ingestion, predicting deploying and diagnosing)
  • 2+ years' experience in deep learning and natural nets
And if you've got knowledge or experience in:
  • Communication/ leadership skills
  • SQL experience
Those are certainly plusses!

You must also be able to thrive in a fast-paced, deadline-driven environment. Leadership ability and excellent interpersonal & communication skills here are absolutely essential.

IN EXCHANGE FOR YOUR HARD WORK

You're offered you:
  • A fun, collaborative and innovative place to work
  • And more!
